tool_description: Using a full chrome browser, get complete screenshots of any public-facing website on the internet.
name: Website URL to Screenshot
title: Website URL to Screenshot

api_list.name: Full Page Screenshot
api_list.description: Get a full length screenshot of an website url.

api_list.name: Small Screenshot
api_list.description: Get a small screenshot of the top portion of an website url.

api_list.name: Status
api_list.description: Check if the API is up or down
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://website-url-to-screenshot.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "website-url-to-screenshot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://website-url-to-screenshot.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "website-url-to-screenshot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
